text:
Although apache by default installs almost everything under the same directory,
many users configure it to install components shatered on the system.
Although apache has these options for installation, there is still no uninstall
function in the Makefile to do a normal 'make uninstall'. Thus uninstallation
still has to be done manually, with a big possibility the user forgets to
uninstall several components.
creator: Question_q13@yahoo.co.uk
slive@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11259 ***
